about_the_game:
Five Nights: No Escape - The co-op Horror Experience!


Take on a new job at Megan’s Mall where you and a friend will need to watch after the night shift, featuring the Mall’s animatronics of course. Can you and your friends manage the office’s power long enough to survive to morning in this VR Horror Experience?

  • Immersive Experience: Realistic scenes and sounds keep your adrenaline pumping!
  • Online Co-op: Team up with a friend for double the scares and fun!
  • Real-time Voice Chat: Communicate easily with your partner in real-time!
  • Realistic Physics: Enjoy lifelike interactions and collisions!
  • Hidden Secrets: Discover the mall's darkest mysteries

We invite you to join our official Discord to meet other players online, share game clips, make new nightguard friends, and chat with our development team. All game updates, announcements, and events are hosted here -- why not join us?

What are you waiting for? Grab your friends and get your new summer job started now!

name: Five Nights: No Escape VR Demo
short_description: Survive Five Nights in Multiplayer co-op with real-time voice chat! Welcome to Megan’s Mall where your job is to uncover mysteries, find the truth, and survive by managing your power -- It's a summer job you will never forget!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
